revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (2), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (2)

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "MV440 MV3.1", "06.26.2008.", "7020MV440311" is silkscreened on the top and bottom of one particular MV440's board.
There is no FCC ID printed on the unit's label, but the internal wireless module is labeled.
The power adapter included with the unit may be an ''unbranded'' S024JU1200200 (100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 600mA -> 12VDC, 2000mA).
